data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a sister module to Lutherie::FretCalc.
    Lutherie::StringTension is used to calculate string tension and
    gauge for musical instrument strings, while Lutherie::FretCalc
    calculates fret spacing. I've chosen Lutherie as a rootlevel
    namespace as no other existing rootlevel namespace seemed
    appropriate. These modules are aimed specifically for stringed
    instrument builders.
